overview: History reveals that slaves from the West African tribe Mandinka were highly prized commodities amongst white masters in the antebellum South. While slavery is no longer an acceptable lifestyle, the Mandinkas are more popular than ever with affluent white couples willing to pay to relive the glorious past. Clandestine interracial gang bangs known as ‘Mandingo Parties’ are now sweeping the country. What you are about to see is based on true events... so brace yourself. You are about to witness the ‘mutting’ of the Anglo wife.
title: Mandinka Parties 2
